title: Getting Started with Akira Docs Installation
description: Detailed instructions on how to install Akira Docs, including system requirements and setup procedures.
author: Akira Docs Team

blocks.content: Before you begin, ensure you have the following installed on your machine:

Node.js
npm or Yarn
Basic Command Line Knowledge
Follow these steps to install Akira Docs:

Clone the Repository
Navigate to the Project Directory
Install Dependencies
Start the Development Server

git clone https://github.com/yourusername/akira-docs.git
cd akira-docs
npm install
npm start
To create your first documentation page using Akira Docs, follow these steps:

Create a New Document
Add Content
View Your Document

mkdir docs
cd docs
touch my-first-doc.md
Open `my-first-doc.md` and add the following content:

# My First Document

Welcome to Akira Docs! This is a simple document to get you started.
Run the development server to view your documentation.
Now that you have a basic setup, consider exploring the Akira Docs features to enhance your documentation experience.
